Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Worker
public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
the Worker class represents the piece on the board: it's owned by a player and can move around the Board and build stories.
Author:
Marco Re

    • getPreviousCell

    • setCanMoveUp

      public void setCanMoveUp​(boolean canMoveUp)
      set if a worker can move up
      Parameters:
      canMoveUp - is true if a worker can move up, is false if a worker can't move up for effect of a god

    • isCanMoveUp

      public boolean isCanMoveUp()
      return if a worker can move up
      Returns:
